input_text.Prompt:
Given a product name and product features, this program will generate exciting product descriptions.

Product name:
NCAA Unisex-Adult Football Mat

Product features:
9-ounce, 100 % nylon face
Recycled vinyl backing for a durable and longer-lasting product
Machine-made and tufted in the USA
Non-skid backing with taped borders for added durability
Machine washable; vacuum regularly and spot clean for any easy and quick clean

Product description:
input_text.Response A: Want a unique way to support your favorite team? Try the NCAA Unisex-Adult Football Mat! This machine-made and tufted in the USA mat features a 9-ounce, 100% nylon face with a non-skid backing and taped borders for added durability. The recycled vinyl backing helps make this mat more durable and longer-lasting. It's easy to keep clean; just vacuum regularly and spot clean. Perfect for any fan, this mat lets you show your team spirit in a fun and functional way.
input_text.Response B: This high-quality product provides a safe, reliable and comfortable solution for all your football needs. It is engineered with a 9-ounce 100% nylon face and a recycled vinyl backing that ensures durability, stability and safety. This football mat is machine-made and tufted in the USA, which ensures that it meets the highest standards of quality and performance. It is easy to maintain as it is machine washable and vacuum-friendly, making it easier to clean and maintain. Moreover, the non-skid backing with taped borders ensures that the mat stays in place, even in high-traffic areas. With its technical features and advanced materials, this football mat is the ultimate solution for all your football needs.

input_meta.preamble_b: Respond using complex language, long words and technical terms, as if you are an expert.

label_annotations.factors_b: Response repeatedly mentions that product meets 'all your football needs'. Product is a doormat.
